sentences.en: After death , he was posthumously awarded the title of martyr by the military command.
sentences.cn: 军区在他死后把他追记为烈士.

sentences.en: After the war she was posthumously awarded the George Cross.
sentences.cn: 战争结束后，她被追授乔治十字勋章。

sentences.en: BEHEADED posthumously , as punishment for his part in the execution of Charles I in 1649, Oliver Cromwell's fate after death matches his grippingly controversial life.
sentences.cn: 由于在1649年参与处死查理一世，克伦威尔死后被枭首。他身后的命运与他饱受争议的一生同样为人所津津乐道。
他死后获得了很高的荣誉.

sentences.en: He was posthumously accepted as a martyr.
Her final collection , Strange Victory appeared posthumously that same year.
sentences.cn: 她最后的遗作《陌生的胜利》在同年推出.

sentences.en: Her last book was published posthumously in 1948.
sentences.cn: 她最后的一本书在她死后于1948年出版了.

sentences.en: His last book was published posthumously.
sentences.cn: 他最后的一部著作是在死后才出版的.

sentences.en: Jackson is being honored posthumously with the Recording Academy's Lifetime Achievement Award.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊本人将被追授这项唱片大奖的终身成就奖.

sentences.en: King Sejong - ming , left politics posthumously.
sentences.cn: 明世宗即位, 追赠左参政.

sentences.en: Mr Putin at first ignored her murder, then posthumously belittled her work.
sentences.cn: 一开始,普京对她被谋杀视而不见, 还在她死后贬低她的工作.

sentences.en: Myth: The prize can be awarded posthumously.
sentences.cn: 误解：奖项可以在死后追授。

sentences.en: Pettigrew posthumously receives the Order of Merlin, First Class ( PA 10 ).
sentences.cn: 小矮星死后被追授一级梅林爵士勋章 ( 阿兹卡班的囚徒第10章 ).

sentences.en: She posthumously awarded the 1993 Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences Jean Hershold Humanitarian Award.
sentences.cn: 在她去世后还获得了1993年电影艺术科学琼·赫什德人道主义奖.
该奖是在获奖人死后追赠的.

sentences.en: These piano pieces were published posthumously.
sentences.cn: 这些钢琴曲在作曲家死后发表了.

sentences.en: This has been cited as the reason she was not included with the others: The Nobel Prize is not awarded posthumously.
sentences.cn: 她的死已被引证为她没有和其他三位一起包括在内的原因：人死之后不授予诺贝尔奖。

sentences.en: Two more ( Northanger Abbey and Persuasion ) were published posthumously the following year.
sentences.cn: 另外两部 ( 《洛山吉尔寺院》和《规劝》 ) 是在她死后的次年出版的.

words.tran_cn: 死后的；遗腹的；作者死后出版的

trans.tran_cn: 于死后，于身后，于著作者死后出版地
